cbt_techniques.name: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Techniques
cbt_techniques.description: Evidence-based CBT interventions for mental health

techniques.name: Thought Challenging
techniques.description: Identify and challenge negative thought patterns
steps: Write down evidence for and against the thought
prompts: What evidence do you have that supports this thought?
What would you tell a friend in this situation?
How likely is this worst-case scenario?

techniques.name: Behavioral Activation
steps: Identify activities you used to enjoy
Track mood before and after activities
prompts: What activities used to bring you joy?
What small step could you take today?
How did you feel after completing this activity?

techniques.name: Problem Solving
steps: Evaluate pros and cons of each solution
Choose and implement the best solution
prompts: What exactly is the problem you're facing?
What are all the possible ways to address this?
What are the pros and cons of each option?

mindfulness_exercises.name: Mindfulness and Meditation
mindfulness_exercises.description: Mindfulness practices for stress reduction and emotional regulation

exercises.name: Breathing Meditation
exercises.description: Focus on your breath to calm the mind
instructions: Close your eyes or soften your gaze
When your mind wanders, gently return to your breath

exercises.name: Body Scan Meditation
exercises.description: Systematically scan your body for tension
instructions: Lie down comfortably or sit in a chair
Start at the top of your head
Slowly scan down through your body
Continue until you reach your toes

exercises.name: Loving-Kindness Meditation
exercises.description: Cultivate compassion for yourself and others
instructions: Sit comfortably and close your eyes
Start by directing loving-kindness to yourself
Repeat phrases like 'May I be happy, may I be healthy'
Gradually extend to loved ones, acquaintances, and all beings
Feel the warmth and compassion in your heart

crisis_interventions.name: Crisis Intervention Techniques
crisis_interventions.description: Immediate support strategies for crisis situations

interventions.name: Safety Planning
interventions.description: Create a plan for staying safe during crisis
steps: Identify warning signs that indicate you're in crisis
List coping strategies that help you feel better
Identify people you can contact for support
List professional resources and emergency contacts
Create a safe environment by removing means of self-harm
Plan for what to do if you feel unsafe
resources: Crisis Text Line: Text HOME to 741741

interventions.name: Grounding Techniques
interventions.description: Techniques to help you stay present and calm

techniques.name: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
steps: End with your head and face

mood_tracking.name: Mood Tracking and Monitoring
mood_tracking.description: Tools for tracking mood and identifying patterns

tools.name: Daily Mood Check-in
tools.description: Quick daily assessment of mood and energy
questions: On a scale of 1-10, how is your mood today?
How well did you sleep last night?
What's one thing you're grateful for today?

communication_skills.name: Communication and Social Skills
communication_skills.description: Skills for improving relationships and communication

skills.name: Active Listening
skills.description: Fully engage with what others are saying
techniques: Avoid interrupting or planning your response

skills.name: Assertive Communication
skills.description: Express your needs clearly and respectfully
techniques: Listen to the other person's perspective
